mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeNum, noticeCategory, noticeSubject, noticeContent, noticeReadcount, noticeDate, noticeFile) VALUES (#{noticeNum}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeReadcount}, #{noticeDate}, #{noticeFile})
mapper.select: SELECT n.noticeNum, n.noticeCategory, n.noticeSubject, e.empName, n.noticeReadcount, n.noticeDate FROM notice n LEFT JOIN employees e ON n.empId = e.empId ORDER BY noticeNum DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT n.noticeNum, n.noticeCategory, n.noticeSubject, e.empName, n.noticeReadcount, n.noticeDate, n.noticeContent FROM notice n LEFT JOIN employees e ON n.empId = e.empId WHERE noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
